title: The Importance of Continuous Bug Testing
content: Traditional bug testing often misses vulnerabilities. Continuous bug-hunting across the product development lifecycle lets you identify and analyze processes. This technique lets you address root causes through systematic process improvements instead of reactively patching vulnerabilities.

features.title: Find Hidden Flaws
features.text: Discover where flaws are hidden within your product development lifecycle to stop bugs at the source.

features.title: Close Vulnerability Gaps
features.text: Instead of reactively fixing vulnerabilities, addressing the root cause strengthens your security.
